message: I think there are a number of additional backends hidden in various forks that I would like to bring out to the community. I don't think it's useful to include these all in social_auth.backends.contrib because creating a backend takes a knowledge of the website API which seems like an unnecessary burden to put on @omab. To help get this started I have added a grid on DjangoPackages:

I've added my meetup.com and last.fm backends. If you have a backend in a fork please consider breaking it out into its own app so that people can more easily use it. Any thoughts or comments are welcome.
@MechanisM ohh just noticed tumblr already here!! yay!!
thanxx a lot!! I wanted last.fm one. and will wait when tumblr.com appears there.
Good initiative, I've linked the page in the README file (and sphinx doc), here's the changeset https://github.com/omab/django-social-auth/commit/4eb77d7fefac3aebffbcae865f1eef64645f1329
